about.summary: PyDM library of widgets for the Linac Coherent Light Source (LCLS) at SLAC

name: pcdswidgets
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pcdswidgets" %}
{% set version = "0.3.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/pcdshub/pcdswidgets/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 418345fe6b801a6ca76e8e6502989769d428a945686584aee38f36efedd08344

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.6
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3.6
    - pydm >=1.9.0

test:
  imports:
    - pcdswidgets

about:
  home: https://github.com/pcdshub/pcdswidgets
  doc_url: https://pcdshub.github.io/pcdswidgets/
  license: LicenseRef-BSD-3-Clause-SLAC
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE.md
  summary: 'PyDM library of widgets for the Linac Coherent Light Source (LCLS) at SLAC'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - klauer
    - hhslepicka
